userStories.title: Scaffold backend for file I/O and process control

acceptanceCriteria: Watch tasks.json and progress.txt for external changes
Auto-refresh progress view when progress.txt changes
If tasks.json changes and there are unsaved edits, lock editor and prompt reload

Inline validation errors for required fields

userStories.title: Progress panel and runner panel
acceptanceCriteria: Render progress.txt as plain text in a read-only panel
Runner panel allows configuring a command and starting/stopping it
Show running status and live logs

userStories.title: Wire UI to backend and save tasks.json
acceptanceCriteria: Save edits back to tasks.json with validation

userStories.title: Startup UX and polish
acceptanceCriteria: Show top-level app title and brief guidance
